title: CDA Chairman orders swift development in Islamabad’s sectors
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 26 (APP):Capital Development Authority (CDA) Chairman Mohammad Ali Randhawa directed authorities concerned to accelerate development work in various sectors to facilitate the residents.
He instructed in a meeting held the other day to review development work in various sectors.
With regard to long-standing issues of Sector E-12 residents, the Chairman directed the establishment of a single window facility to provide legitimate rehabilitation benefits to affected individuals.
Furthermore, Randhawa instructed officials to remove bottlenecks hindering progress in Sector C-15, ensuring swift development in the area.
Expressing satisfaction with the ongoing development in Sectors C-14 and C-16, the Chairman commended the team’s efforts and encouraged them to maintain the momentum.
This latest push for development is expected to bring relief to residents and contribute to Islamabad’s growth, solidifying its status as a modern and well-planned city.
